8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-y-alignment

Generic function

Summary

Returns the vertical alignment of the specified gadget.

Signature

gadget-x-alignment gadget => alignment

Arguments

gadget
An instance of type <gadget>.

Values

alignment
An instance of type one-of(#"top", #"bottom", #"center").

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the vertical alignment of gadget. You can only set the vertical alignment of a gadget when first initializing that gadget, using the y-alignment: init-keyword.

See also

gadget-x-alignment, page 594

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
